<template>
  <Form v-show=showForm />
  <button @click="showForm = !showForm" class="btn-success">Show form</button>
</template>

<script>
import Form from "./components/form"
import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.css';

export default {
  name: 'App',
  components: {
    Form
  },
  data() {
    return {
      showForm: false
    }
  },
  // methods: {
  //   showFormButton(){

  // }

}
</script>
